pages.title: Crystallizer
pages.text: The crystallizer is a block that compresses and crystallises items using molds made of gold.

pages.title: Crystallizer
pages.text: "§oThe Crystallizer compresses and crystallises items to other ones, for example, pressing a Mid-Term Ingot with a singularity mold in the off-hand, will give the player one mid-term and will not consume the mold."§r - In-game description of the crystallizer.
